Package de.fraunhofer.aisec.cpg.graph.statements

Class LabelStatement

java.lang.Object
de.fraunhofer.aisec.cpg.graph.Node
de.fraunhofer.aisec.cpg.graph.statements.Statement
de.fraunhofer.aisec.cpg.graph.statements.LabelStatement
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeclarationHolder, Persistable, IVisitable<de.fraunhofer.aisec.cpg.graph.Node>
public class LabelStatement
extends Statement
A label attached to a statement that is used to change control flow by labeled continue and breaks (Java) or goto(C++).
